column4: http://wiki.osuosl.org/display/DEV/Java+on+Debian looks like the URL, but just checked, it's probably not helpful in your case.
Anyone know if Ubuntu plans to use jigdo?
there's been a bit of discussion, but not much forward motion
you can always rsync daily to daily (or otherwise)
Mind if I ask, what kinds of contracts come your way?
we do professional services for ubuntu, and can be very flexible in terms of services offered
Any Stormix refugees on the Ubuntu project?
looks just like a filesystem mount
Is there someone else I should tell?  Email, maybe?
